thread.title: NESN to air 17 Hockey East contests, including two UMass Lowell games
thread.title_full: NESN to air 17 Hockey East contests, including two UMass Lowell games

author: Justin Soderberg
title: NESN to air 17 Hockey East contests, including two UMass Lowell games
text:
Tweet on Twitter 
Hockey East and the New England Sports Network today announced that NESN will air 17 Hockey East contests in 2015-16, continuing a relationship that began in 1984 when both the league and network were founded. 
NESN’s broadcasts will feature 12 regular season men’s hockey contests, the Women’s Hockey East Championship on Sunday, March 6 (tape delayed), three men’s hockey playoff games and the Hockey East Championship on Saturday, March 19 from the TD Garden in Boston, Massachusetts. The schedule begins this Friday, October 23 when the Notre Dame Fighting Irish host No. 5 Minnesota Duluth Bulldogs at 6:00 p.m. eastern on NESNplus. 
“NESN and Hockey East share a history and a tradition of excellence that goes back to the founding of each organization more than 30 years ago,” said Hockey East Commissioner Joe Bertagna . “We are thrilled to be able to extend this relationship.” 
The bulk, 14 in total, of the games to air on NESN will be produced by the American Sports Network (ASN). 
“We have a commitment to grow hockey and serve fans in New England with a wide range of coverage,” said Joseph Maar , NESN’s Vice President of Programming and Production, Executive Producer. “We are excited to partner with Hockey East to provide viewers some of the best that the college game has to offer.” 
The No. 7 UMass Lowell River Hawks are on the schedule for two contests with the first coming on Sunday, November 15 when the River Hawks take on the Maine Black Bears in Orono, Maine. UMass Lowell’s other game is on Sunday, December 6 when they play host to the UConn Huskies in Lowell, Massachusetts. 
A complete guide of channel listings can be found at nesn.com . 2015-16 Hockey East on NESN Schedule Mill City Sports' hockey coverage is brought to you by Draft Kings . Play fantasy hockey at DraftKings.com and win cash as soon as the next day! SHARE
